Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDelegate.html.name: calendarInput(_:dateItemChanged:dateButton:)
Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDelegate.html.abstract: This is called when a data item changes (user selects the item).

Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.name: day
Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.abstract: The day of the month (1 -> [28|29|30|31]), as an integer.

Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.name: isEnabled
Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.abstract: True, if the item is enabled for selection.

Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.name: isSelected
Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.abstract: True, if the item is currently selected.

Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.name: refCon
Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.abstract: Reference context. This is how we attach arbitrary data to the item.

Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.name: date
Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.abstract: Return the date item state as a date. OPTIONAL

Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.name: dateComponents
Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.abstract: Return the date item state as date components. OPTIONAL

Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.name: dateSortKey
Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.abstract: This allows us to sort the data by the date.

Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.name: RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProtocol
Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDateItemProto.abstract: This protocol defines the basic structure of one item of the stored data.

Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDelegate.html.name: RVS_CalendarInputDelegate
Protocols/RVS_CalendarInputDelegate.html.abstract: This is used to send change notifications out.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa17RVS_Calenda.name: yearRange
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa17RVS_Calenda.abstract: This returns the range of years. It uses the calendar system for the data.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa17RVS_Calenda.name: monthRange(for:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa17RVS_Calenda.abstract: This returns the range of months, in the given year. IT allows the user to specify a calendar to use for this.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa17RVS_Calenda.name: dayRange(year:month:calendar:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa17RVS_Calenda.abstract: This returns the range of months, in the given year. It allows the user to specify a calendar to use for this.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa17RVS_Calenda.name: allResults(forThisYear:forThisMonth:forThisDayOfTheMonth:enabled:selected:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa17RVS_Calenda.abstract: This returns a filtered array of the data, depending on the criteria provided. The criteria are all optional.

Extensions/Array.html.name: Array
Extensions/Array.html.abstract: This extension allows you to filter an Array, and get some information about the contents.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DayButton.html.name: dateItem
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DayButton.html.abstract: The date item associated with this instance. Remember that we are using reference emantics for the date items.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DayButton.html.name: layoutSubviews()
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DayButton.html.abstract: Called when the views are being laid out.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DateItem.html#.name: day
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DateItem.html#.abstract: The day of the month (1 -> [28|29|30|31]), as an integer. REQUIRED

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DateItem.html#.name: isEnabled
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DateItem.html#.abstract: True, if the item is enabled for selection. Default is false. OPTIONAL

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DateItem.html#.name: isSelected
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DateItem.html#.abstract: True, if the item is currently selected. Default is false. OPTIONAL

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DateItem.html#.name: refCon
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DateItem.html#.abstract: Reference context. This is how we attach arbitrary data to the item. OPTIONAL

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DateItem.html#.name: init(day:month:year:isEnabled:isSelected:refCon:)
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DateItem.html#.abstract: Default Initializer. The calendar used, will be the current one.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: data
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: This contains the data that defines the state of this control. This will have every day shown by the control; not just the ones passed in. READ-ONLY

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: weekdayHeaderHeightInDisplayUnits
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The height, in display units, of the weekday header.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: yearHeaderHeightInDisplayUnits
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The height, in display units, of the year header.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: monthHeaderHeightInDisplayUnits
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The height, in display units, of the month header.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: calendar
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: This contains the calendar used for the control. It defaults to the current calendar, but can be changed.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: weekdayHeaderFont
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The font to be used for the weekday header, at the top.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: yearHeaderFont
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The font to be used for the year header.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: monthHeaderFont
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The font to be used for the month header.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: weekdayFont
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The font to be used for each of the days.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: enabledItemBackgroundColor
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: This is the color for the background of unselected and enabled days.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: weekdayHeaderFontColor
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The font to be used for the weekday header, at the top.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: yearHeaderFontColor
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The font color to be used for the year header.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: monthHeaderFontColor
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The font color to be used for the month header.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: yearHeaderBackgroundColor
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The background color to be used for the year header.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: monthHeaderBackgroundColor
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The background color to be used for the month header.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: disabledAlpha
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The opacity of disabled date buttons.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/c:@M@RVS.name: showMonthHeaders
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/c:@M@RVS.abstract: If this is false (default is true), then the month headers will not be shown.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/c:@M@RVS.name: showYearHeaders
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/c:@M@RVS.abstract: If this is false (default is true), then the year headers will not be shown.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/c:@M@RVS.name: showWeekdayHeader
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/c:@M@RVS.abstract: If this is false (default is true), then the weekday header will not be shown.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/c:@M@RVS.name: readOnlyMode
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/c:@M@RVS.abstract: If this is true (default is false), then each day button acts in a “momentary” fashion, and the control does not leave the day selected.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: delegate
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: This is the delegate that is used to receive notifications of date items changing. The delegate needs to be a class, and this is a weak reference.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: scrollView
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: The scroller that will contain the view.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: setupData
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: This is basically a write-only way to set up the control. Read will always return an empty array.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.name: init(frame:setUpData:delegate:)
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/s:17RVS_.abstract: This allows the instance to be instantiated with an initial frame and/or initial data and/or a delegate.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/c:@CM@RV.name: layoutSubviews()
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html#/c:@CM@RV.abstract: Called when we will lay out our view hierarchy.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DateItem.html.name: DateItem
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DateItem.html.abstract: This is one element of the data that is provided to, and read from, the view.

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DayButton.html.name: DayButton
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput/DayButton.html.abstract: Each day is represented by a button. This allows us to associate a DateItem with the button, and customize its display

Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html.name: RVS_CalendarInput
Classes/RVS_CalendarInput.html.abstract: This is a customized UIView implementation, that will display a basic month/grid calendar, with active buttons, on selected dates.
